login_invalid_credentials: Bad credentials, please verify that your username/password are correctly set.
cookie_banner_text: This website only uses functional cookies to provide you a smooth experience. No other cookies are used.
network_error: Connection issues detected. Please check your internet connection and try again.
cors_error: There was a security issue with the upload. Please try again or contact support if the problem persists.
token_expired: Your session has expired. Please log in again to continue.
unexpected: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

errors.unsupported_format: Unsupported file format. Please upload a PDF, Word, JPG, PNG, or ZIP file.
errors.file_too_large: File size exceeds {{size}}MB limit. Please choose a smaller file.
errors.no_file: No file detected. Please try again.
errors.no_file_selected: No file selected. Please try again.
errors.unusable_body: There was an issue processing your document. Please try uploading again.
errors.payload_too_large: The file size exceeds the {{size}}MB limit. Please compress your file or upload a smaller one.
errors.rate_limit: Too many upload attempts. Please wait a moment before trying again.

dialog.title: Upload document
dialog.description: Upload your awesome document here. You can upload a PDF, Word, or Markdown file. We will check if it follows the guidelines. Thanks for sharing your knowledge with the world!
dialog.error: Failed to upload document. Please try again.

anonymous.label: Anonymous
anonymous.description: Do you want to upload this document anonymously?

name.min: Name must be at least {{min}} characters
name.max: Name must be less than {{max}} characters

year.format: Academic year must be in format YYYY - YYYY

home.title: Home
home.description: Welcome to Burgieclan! Your best friend in studying for exams. We provide a platform where students can share their study materials with each other. This way, you can help each other out and make studying a lot easier. So, what are you waiting for? Dive into the world of Burgieclan and start sharing your knowledge!
home.recent_activities: Pick up where you left off

errors.fetch_failed: Failed to load form data. Please try again.

course-page.error-fetching: An error occurred while fetching the course data:

comments.title: Subject evaluation
comments.description: Each of these comments is someone's opinion. Please be respectful. If you have a question about the course, please contact the course coordinator.

dialog.title: Add new comment
dialog.description: Please share your experience with this course. Your feedback helps other students make informed decisions.
dialog.content-placeholder: Share your experience with this course...

account.welcome_text: Welcome to your account page. Here you will find some information about your favorites and your contributions to Burgieclan.
account.name: Name

favorite.no_programs: You have no favorite programs yet.
favorite.no_documents: You have no favorite documents yet.

documents.no_uploads: You haven't uploaded any documents yet.
